xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnFinancialR: Notes for Financial Results 1. Other income includes Gain/(loss) on sale of property, plant and equipment, net . Notes for Cash Flow Cash flows from operating activities 1. Adjustments for finance costs - This item includes Finance and other income, net of finance costs . 2. Adjustments for decrease (increase) in other current assets - This item includes decrease (increase) in both Current and Non-current Other Assets. 3. Adjustments for other financial assets, current - This item includes decrease (increase) in “Unbilled receivables” and “Contract assets”. 4. Adjustments for increase (decrease) in trade payables, current - This item includes increase (decrease) in “both Current and Non-current Trade payables, other liabilities and provisions”. 5. Adjustments for increase (decrease) in other current liabilities - This item includes increase (decrease) in “Contract liabilities”. 6. Adjustments for unrealized foreign exchange gains losses includes Unrealised exchange (gain)/loss and net exchange (gain)/loss on loans to subsidiaries . 7. Other adjustments for which cash effects are investing or financing cash flow - This item includes (Gain)/loss on sale of property, plant and equipment, net . 8. Other adjustments for non-cash items - This item includes Lifetime expected credit loss . Cash flows from investing activities 9. Other inflows (outflows) of cash - This item includes “Repayment of security deposit for property, plant and equipment”.
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DescriptionOfOtherExpenses: Software license expense for internal use
Software license expense for internal use
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnAssetsAndL: 1. Property, plant and equipment includes “Property, plant and equipment” and “Right-of-Use assets”. 2. Other non-current assets includes “Non-current tax assets (net)” and “Other non-current assets”. 3. Other current financial assets includes “Derivative assets”, “Unbilled receivables” and “Other financial assets”. 4. Other current assets includes “Contract assets” and “Other current assets”. 5. Other non-current financial liabilities includes “Lease liabilities”, “Derivative liabilities” and “Other financial liabilities”. 6. Other non-current liabilities includes “Non-current tax liabilities (net)” and “Other non-current liabilities”. 7. Other current financial liabilities includes “Derivative liabilities”, “Lease liabilities” and “Other financial liabilities”. 8. Other current liabilities includes “Contract liabilities” and “Other current liabilities”.
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DescriptionOfItemThatWillNotB: Re-measurements of the defined benefit plans, net
Net change in fair value of investment in equity instruments measured at fair value through OCI
Re-measurements of the defined benefit plans, net
Net change in fair value of investment in equity instruments measured at fair value through OCI
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DescriptionOfItemThatWillBeRe: Net change in time value of option contracts designated as cash flow hedges
Net change in intrinsic value of option contracts designated as cash flow hedges
Net change in fair value of forward contracts designated as cash flow hedges
Net change in fair value of investment in debt instruments measured at fair value through OCI
Net change in time value of option contracts designated as cash flow hedges
Net change in intrinsic value of option contracts designated as cash flow hedges
Net change in fair value of forward contracts designated as cash flow hedges
Net change in fair value of investment in debt instruments measured at fair value through OCI
